settings.not_found_text:
This is embarrassing. Our website fell over while clipped in at a stoplight. Sorry about that!

For your trouble, here's some free coaching: When riding for more than an hour, you should consuming carbs every 15-30 min and aim to take in 60-90 grams every hour. Happy fueling!

Continue shopping.

settings.newsletter_text: Want to know first about our next pre-sale? Want a curated list of the best cycling content from across the web in your inbox each week? Drop your email and we'll do our best to entertain you.

settings.title: EVERY PIECE OF GEAR HAS A HOME
settings.text: No more digging and searching for your stuff. The Bag has 20+ features and pockets built to keep your gear in its place. Whether it's a spare chain link or your helmet, it's always at your fingertips.

settings.title: NOT JUST A TRAVEL BAG
settings.text: When your home storage is also your travel bag, it doesn't matter if you're loading your jersey pockets at home or throwing The Bag in the car - you're always prepared. Minimize packing time, maximize ride time.

settings.title: UNMATCHED VERSATILITY
settings.text: Stowaway backpack straps, a hidden headrest hood, attachment points for a rear light and super bright reflective printing means you can store and move your gear any way you want.

settings.title: QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS? IDEAS? FEEDBACK?
settings.content_text:
We'd love to hear from you!

Fill out the form or email us at hello@rideparc.com and we'll most likely get back to you within 24 hours. Unless it's the weekend, because we'll be out riding bikes. Obviously.

settings.title: Is The Bag good for commuting to work or school?
settings.answer: Not really. The Bag was built for your cycling gear, not for laptops, books, lunches or other work/school supplies. Would it work? Probably. But there are better commute-specific bags out there. Maybe a future Parc product...

settings.title: Is there a place for my helmet?
settings.answer: Yes! There are two large pockets on the interior of The Bag. Both are big enough to fit most standard road and MTB helmets. Full-face helmets, large enduro style helmets and some time trial helmets will not fit.

settings.title: Is there a spot for my water bottles on the outside?
settings.answer: No. Because of the orientation of the The Bag when zipped in backpack mode and when hanging open, there really isn't a great place for a water bottle sleeve. Nothing better than ice cold water though, so we usually have a separate small cooler or insulated jug.

settings.title: Is this just for traveling?
settings.answer: Heck no! The Bag is meant to be a forever, every day home for the gear you use most. Load it up once, and enjoy grab and go access at home and on the road, no packing and unpacking required.

settings.title: Is The Bag only for people who race?
settings.answer: Not at all! The Bag is for every cyclist, no matter what surface you ride on, what bike you ride, or how far or fast you go. We want to help you organize, transport and access your gear no matter where you're taking it.

settings.title: How big is The Bag?
settings.answer: Provide the answer to the question here.

settings.title: What does Pre-Sale mean? When will my Bag arrive?
settings.answer: We launched on Kickstarter in April 2021 to raise funds for our first full round of production. As of the beginning of July 2021, production has begun, but we're extending the pre-sale (and discount) until the Bags arrive. Once the Bags are in our hands and shipping out to pre-sale buyers and Kickstarter backers, our prices will be raised to normal retail. There are a limited number of Bags available for pre-sale, so don't miss out!

settings.title: When will my Kickstarter order arrive?
settings.answer: We started production in the beginning of July, but the factory is dealing with COVID lockdowns. This will likely add two weeks to the initial estimation of 30 days. Once our Bags leave the factory, delays in shipping are also possible, so it's very difficult to estimate an actual delivery date to Backers. We're still hoping to ship to Backers before end of September, and will provide updates through Kickstarter as we know more.

settings.title: Can I get a deal on Bags for my whole team? Can we get our logo on them?
settings.answer: Yes, team deals are available. Custom logos may be available in the future. If you would be interested in doing custom logos, email sam@rideparc.com with some details and a general estimate of the number of Bags you'd like to order.

settings.title: Can I buy or see The Bag in retail stores?
settings.answer: We are not currently selling in retail stores, though may in the future. RideParc.com is the only place to purchase a Bag, so please tell us if you see them elsewhere?

settings.custom_description:
THE GEAR BAG HAS BEEN REINVENTED.

When you can see your gear, you know you're prepared. And when all of your gear lives in one place, you're only seconds from your next ride. No packing needed.

IF YOU NEED IT, THE BAG CAN HOLD IT.

settings.title: "Quick and easy to get to all of your stuff"
settings.subtitle: "It's like a giant toiletry bag, but made for your bike stuff instead of toothpaste and shampoo."

settings.title: "This is one of the best bike-centric gear bags I've tried to date"
"Although it can be worn as a backpack, the ingenuity of the design reveals itself once you open it up"

settings.title: "One of the best bike-centric gear bags"

Ever showed up to a ride
without your shoes?

Us too.
settings.text: So, we built a home for them. Real organization means seeing what you have, being able to grab only what you need, and having a spot for every item. We invented The Bag because we were sick of huge piles of gear, time wasted packing and ruined rides.

settings.title: Built by cyclists, for cyclists
settings.text:
We built the Bag to organize our helmets, AND our tools. Our CO2 and our kit. We want to see our stuff. We want everything in its place. We want to zip it up and take it all with us. We want one bag at home and on the road - no packing needed. We want clutter free cars.
We want to pull up, park, grab our gear and go ride.

settings.title: Designed to perform
settings.text: Wherever you ride, The Bag is ready to go. Throw your muddy gear inside and ride home in the rain. Waterproof materials inside and out keep moisture out, or in, and make for easy cleaning. Carry it as a backpack, hang it at home or in the car. Reflective printing and a light loop keep you visible in low light.

settings.title: EVERY PIECE OF GEAR HAS A HOME
settings.text: No more digging and searching for your stuff. The Bag has 20+ features and pockets built to keep your gear in its place. Whether it's a spare chain link or your helmet, it's always at your fingertips.

settings.title: NOT JUST A TRAVEL BAG
settings.text: When your home storage is also your travel bag, it doesn't matter if you're loading your jersey pockets at home or throwing The Bag in the car - you're always prepared. Minimize packing time, maximize ride time.

settings.title: UNMATCHED VERSATILITY
settings.text: Stowaway backpack straps, a hidden headrest hood, attachment points for a rear light and super bright reflective printing means you can store and move your gear any way you want.
